basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm TJ Parker. I'm working cutting edge technology like React, Express, Node.js and MongoDB. What you are seeing now is my portfolio! I'm really excited to be a part of the world of technology, there's so much room to grow and explore. Before this I was working as an appliance repair technician, which kept my ability to problem solve on its toes in a high pressure environment. When someone's oven goes out three days before THanksgiving there's few feelings better than being able to deliver for that customer. The idea of taking this problem solving mindset in newer more uncertain world like software development sounds like a grand adventure I'm eager to be a part of

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
